revised_title: Microscopic Observations on Sugar Crystals and Blood Circulation in Eels
tldr: Antony van Leeuwenhoek shares his observations on the crystalline structure of sugar particles and the circulation of blood in eels. He describes his methods for observing these phenomena, including using microscopes and copper plates. His findings challenge previous understandings of sugar's structure and reveal new insights into the circulation of blood in eels.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Microscopy and Crystallography
